text: Psycholinguistics or psychology of language is the study of the psychological and neurobiological factors that allows humans to get, use, and understand language. It studies how our minds allow us to understand language and produce language. One part of psycholinguistics, developmental psycholinguistics studies how children learn to talk. == Other websites == * Max Planck Institute for Psycholinguistics official website Category:Branches of linguistics Category:Branches of psychology Category:Linguistics terminology
title: Psycholinguistics
